disable: DC 28  Thievery  (trained) to disrupt the magical energy, or DC 27  Arcana  or  Occultism  (trained) to realign the magical energy
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Hazard 6" pfs="">[False Step Floor](/Hazards.aspx?ID=186)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 123</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

Each time a creature enters the room, it slips through the floor, tumbles through an interdimensional void, and falls back into the room through the ceiling, landing on the floor.

---

**Stealth**
DC 25

**Disable**
DC 28 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (trained) to disrupt the magical energy, or DC 27 [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) or [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) (trained) to realign the magical energy

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**False Step** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) **Trigger** A creature enters the room and steps onto the floor; **Effect** The creature slips through the floor; it tumbles through an interdimensional void before falling back into the room through the ceiling and landing on the floor. The triggering creature takes 40 bludgeoning damage from the fall. That creature can try to [Grab an Edge](/Actions.aspx?ID=95) (DC 24) to avoid falling.

---
**Reset**
automatic
name: False Step Floor
